Class WaterBottleSplashEvent

java.lang.Object

io.papermc.paper.event.entity.WaterBottleSplashEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cancellable
public class WaterBottleSplashEvent extends PotionSplashEvent
Called when a splash water potion "splashes" and affects different entities in different ways.

  • Method Details

    • getToDamage

      @NotNull public @NotNull @Unmodifiable Collection<LivingEntity> getToDamage()
      Gets an immutable collection of entities that will take damage as a result of this event. Use other methods on this class to modify which entities take damage.
      Returns:
      an immutable collection of entities
      See Also:
      • doNotDamageAsWaterSensitive(LivingEntity)
      • damageAsWaterSensitive(LivingEntity)

    • doNotDamageAsWaterSensitive

      Removes this entity from the group that will be damaged.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to remove

    • damageAsWaterSensitive

      public void damageAsWaterSensitive(@NotNull @NotNull LivingEntity entity)

      Parameters:
      entity - entity to add

    • getToRehydrate

      @NotNull public @NotNull Collection<LivingEntity> getToRehydrate()
      Get a mutable collection of entities that will be rehydrated by this.

      As of 1.19.3 this only will contain Axolotls as they are the only entity type that can be rehydrated, but it may change in the future.

      Returns:
      the entities

    • getToExtinguish

      @NotNull public @NotNull Collection<LivingEntity> getToExtinguish()
      Get a mutable collection of entities that will be extinguished as a result of this event.
      Returns:
      entities to be extinguished
